channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1456; 08:14PM; 4180 W 4th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3mmBNZ6; Koreatown; KNOCKDOWN: 42 FF extinguished the fire in 33 minutes with no injuries reported. While there were some (number unknown) windows which were damaged on the exposed apartment building, the fire was stopped from extending into the structure. Firefighters will remain on scene for an unknown duration to conduct extensive overhaul operations to ensure no pockets of fire remain. LA Building and Safety are responding. No further details.; FS 29; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E11 E226 E229 E235 E29 E52 E6 EM11 RA29 T26 T29 T35; CH9; 16; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1456; 07:41PM; 4180 W 4th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3mmBNZ6; Koreatown; Two story, single family dwelling (previous burn) well involved with one apartment building (3 story residential over parking) exposed. Two additional task forces requested (reflected in this alert). Firefighters are in the defensive mode.; FS 29; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E11 E226 E229 E235 E29 E52 E6 EM11 RA29 T26 T29 T35; CH9; 16; Margaret Stewart

Hiker Rescue - Hoist Op; INC#0798; 01:11PM; 3040 Runyon Canyon Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3KnVsj3; Hollywood Hills West; Firefighters located an approximately 50yo female hiker who sustained a lower extremity injury. Due to the terrain and location, LAFD Air Ops is preparing to conduct a hoist operation and transport. The 9-1-1 call was received at 12:47PM No further details.; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E227 E27 E41 H3 H5 HA3 HA5 RA76 RH214 T27 UR27; CH7; 15; Margaret Stewart

Hiker - Hoist Operation; INC#0672; 12:20PM; 8500 W Mulholland Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ZR1KgX; Hollywood Hills West; The call was initially dispatched as a ground level fall. Once firefighters located the patient and assessed his (45yo male) injury, they requested a hoist operation. LAFD Air Ops are preparing to conduct a hoist operation followed by transport for the patient who sustained a leg injury. The 9-1-1 call was received at 11:33AM. No further details.; FS 97; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 E108 E278 E97 EM14 H4 HA4 RA827 RA97 RH114 T78; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Auto vs Pedestrian; INC#0052; 12:45AM; 17400 W Sunset Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3zuYMBP; #PacificPalisades; One vehicle travelling east on Pacific coast highway collided with several pedestrians and vehicles parked on the shoulder, overlooking the beach. One person was fatally struck and was found down on the beach, along with two of the vehicles involved (none in the water). Six patients were transported to the hospital (1 in serious condition, 5 in fair-to-moderate condition). LAPD Inc #0183. Nothing further.; FS 23; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC18 BC4 BC9 CM40 CM42 E19 E23 E263 E269 E288 E37 E63 E88 E90 EM14 EM17 EM9 H4 H5 HA4 HA5 HR3 RA19 RA23 RA37 RA59 RA63 RA69 RA803 RA88 T63 T69 T88 UR88; CH7; 13 15; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1462; 08:15PM; 10320 N Oakdale Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Mn98xy; #Chatsworth; An outside fire partially damaged a two-story home. Firefighters arrived to quickly extinguish the structure and outside fires, protecting the interior of the home. Firefighters are setting up ventilation measures to clear some light smoke that made its way inside. Ultimately, it took 18 firefighters 15 minutes to respond and extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 107; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E107 E28 E287 E296 E73 RA96 T87 T96; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1462; 08:15PM; 10320 N Oakdale Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Mn98xy; #Chatsworth; Two-story single-family home with smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 107; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E107 E28 E287 E296 E73 RA96 T87 T96; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Traffic Collision with Entrapment; INC#1051; 03:19PM; 4329 W Los Feliz Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ZWrxnP; #LosFeliz; Two-vehicle traffic collision with seven people involved. Six patients had only minor injuries (or none) and did not require hospital transport. One patient was trapped. Firefighters extricated the patient and transported them in moderate condition. Unknown age/gender/circumstances.; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E235 E250 E35 E82 EM11 HR3 RA56 RA82 RA835 T35 T50 UR88; CH7; 13 15; Nicholas Prange

Physical Rescue; INC#0461; 09:04AM; 701 N Tigertail Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3KmlKCw; #Brentwood; Firefighters rescued one man, the driver who was trapped, from a traffic collision between a dump truck and multiple parked passenger vehicles, which also took out a series of power poles. The adult male driver was transported to a local hospital in serious condition. There may be extended power outages in the area. Motorists, seek alternate routes. ; FS 19; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC9 E19 E37 E69 EM9 HR3 RA19 RA71 T37 UR88; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Update Structure Fire; INC#1469; 09:07AM; 1539 W Cambria St; #Westlake; LAFD Arson Investigators arrested a 38-year-old male on PC 451(b) for starting a tree fire last night that spread to an inhabited structure at 1539 W Cambria St in Westlake. However, it was unrelated to the recent spree of 26 tree fires, which remains under active investigation.; Nicholas Prange
